column5: Hello What electric fuel pump fits a 1992 4.3l/262 omc cobra marine engine? Thanks! Michael

I would check iboats.com you may even be able to find a nos part. Some of the vuys there are old techs who can help you find the part. Call around, there are old omc dealers that still have plenty of parts in stock.
Would think a 92 still used mechanical pump on side of block
Thanks guys.  The pump is electric, and found one for under $100.00 at Summit racing compared to $300.00 for the exact pump at other places.
Is it a marine rated fuel pump?? Reason being, if you have any sort of a fire ance company can use it as an excuse to not pay up.
